seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Tea Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: How does your tea and beverages store compare? See pagespeed score benchmarks from 13 Shopify tea stores. Median: 48, Top 10%: 77.

key_findings: The average Tea store scores 50 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 77+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 45 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Tea Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 13 Shopify stores in the tea and beverages industry, measuring pagespeed score.
